38006.summary: Some customers in the Swan Lake area of Vernon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38006.title: June 3 – Vernon (Swan Lake) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
